class tilsim.robots.ActualRobot(loc_service)

Passthrough for actual robot.

Uses pose information from a localization service instance and does not perform simulation.

Parameters:

  • host (str) – Localization service host.

  • port (int) – Localization service port.

  • loc_service (tilsdk.localization.LocalizationService) –

property pose
step(dt)

Step the simulation.

For ActualRobot this gets latest pose from localization service.

Parameters:

dt (float) – Time since last simulation step.

Return type:

None
